channel.title: Minimap Clicking
channel.description:
When I right click on my minimap area nothing happens, how do I make it show the options when I right click in that area. everywhere else works that I can right click, except up where the minimap is over the tabs. I want to know so I can make it so u right click on run to rest.
version PI.
